description:
A luxurious Christmas party provides the perfect opportunity for Yamada and Kosuda to take their relationship to the next level! Too bad someone’s watching their every move on a hidden camera!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 2-nen H-gumi no Christmas. Atashi o Bed ni Tsuretette. / Kanejou-san ga Miteru!? Genkai Girigiri "Nama" Housou!
2年H組のクリスマス・イブ あたしをベッドにつれてって♡ / 金城さんが見てる!? 限界ギリギリ『生』放送!
Year 2 Class H`s Christmas Eve! Take Me to Bed! - Kanejo Is Watching?! A "Live" Broadcast That Pushes the Limits!
